info.name: Abducens nerve
info.description: The abducens nerve is the sixth cranial nerve.  It innervates the ipsilateral lateral rectus muscle. It exits the brain stem anteriorly at the pontomedullary junction.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/Lateral to Medial/4 Parasag: Lat to Med
